Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Authorizes facilities for the care and treatment of the mentally disabled to provide treatment for the mental health and health care needs of individuals admitted for a substance use disorder
Summary: Authorizes facilities for the care and treatment of the mentally disabled to provide treatment for the mental health and health care needs of individuals admitted for a substance use disorder; provides that such services shall be reimbursable by Medicaid and private insurance.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.17, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to authorizing facilities for the care and treatment of the mentally disabled to provide treatment for the mental health and health care needs of individuals admitted for a substance use disorder
